entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: WSW 32 km/h gust 44 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
